UTM â€“ UIB MOU
=============

by [fadzly](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/author/fadzly/ "Posts by fadzly")
 | Jul 18, 2024 | [News](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/news/)

![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/451299465_1139330464245916_8090357647512573159_n-980x653.jpg)

15 July 2024 | A Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) Signing Ceremony Between Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM) and Universitas Internasional Batam (UIB) Indonesia was held at Bilik Jamuan, Dewan Sultan Iskandar today.

The signing ceremony was represented by the Vice Chancellor of UTM, Prof. Datuk Ir. Ts. Dr. Ahmad Fauzi Ismail and the Rector of UIB, Dr. Iskandar Itan.

The event was also attended by the Deputy Vice-Chancellor (Student Affairs and Alumni), Prof. Ts. Dr. Ali Selamat, Dean of Faculty of Built Environment & Surveying (FABU), Prof. Sr. Dr. Kherun Nita Ali, and Director of UTM International, Prof. Madya Dr. Mohd Ariffin Abu Hassan.

More picture at : [https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?vanity=osca.utm&set=a.1139332460912383](https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?vanity=osca.utm&set=a.1139332460912383)
